Name: Push the Box
About the game: The game is completely in 3D, in an isometric view, in this game your objective is to push the boxes to position the boxes in the marked place in the scenario, but be careful one wrong move you won't be able to move the box again, so you need to think smart, in the best moves to reach your goal successfully and pass the challenge of each scenario is to proceed in the game.
